::Battera::

She wondered why no one answered her.  She walked along the halls of 
the Cyberton Fire.  She heard voices and walked towards them.
"Hello?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "Yes my friend but in the battle could insure that there is a 
cybertron as
> we know it to return to. That and the fact that if your ship 
doesn't make
> the attempt then you, your crew, and every Transformer myself 
included will
> be reduced to so many cosmic particles when the Iron Fist destroys 
this
> planet, then you wouldn't have existed to stand here and argue the 
point."
> Phobias talented golden tounge worked it's magic on the CF's 
commander, the
> trick would be convincing him of the righteousness of his intent. 
He was
> after all a Predacon.
